name: Everything you Touch Dies!!!
description:
Everything You Touch Dies is a simple action game - you can destroy yellow things by running into them, but red things will destroy you! Fight and dodge your way through 90 intense levels of colorful fun, encountering deadly enemies and battling massive bosses along the way. Your only goal is reaching the end...but that's easier said than done!

If you enjoyed the game, you can check out future projects on my Twitter or Tumblr page! We have GIFs!

Code, art and game by Jacob Vanbendegon

Music by FeignCalm, PhatBoiJr, PolarTrance, and Kylermannn
